name: Ext_R4_Slot_serviceType
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.Slot.serviceType for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Slot.serviceType from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Slot|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The type of appointments that can be booked into this slot (ideally this would be an identifiable service - which is at a location, rather than the location itself). If provided then this overrides the value provided on the availability resource
element.definition: `Slot.serviceType` maps to R5 `Slot.serviceType`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
